Text: Awesome flick.  Also, great commentary.  One note is there's a section of video that's repeated 58:00 to about 1:01:00.  Also being Matroska makes it difficult to fix.  Why mkv/ogg?  Not sure what to use to edit it.

Download the Full Movie in a Variety of Formats from the Internet Archive

link; 
http://www.archive.org/details/my_man_godfrey

Enjoy!!

Even with the looped section, a DVD rip from piratebay is preferable on any day to the crap they put up (and they call it mp4) at such incredible speeds at archive.org. My personal opinion (I have downloaded a few movies from there, when I was naive): don't download movies from that site, unless you're really sure about the quality. 
Thanks a lot for the wonderful rip.
Good copy of this Classic Screwball Comedy Starring William Powell & Carole Lombard....V/M=8/9....DVD quality equivalent or very close to it....Nice rip....Thanx.... 8)
